abstract: Five black current and former employees of Bank of America have filed a lawsuit that accuses the bank of racial discrimination by steering lucrative clients to their white counterparts. The complaint, filed Thursday in the Federal District Court in Boston, contends that the bank discriminates against African-Americans in pay, promotions, training and support services.
